title: Bought Dire Wolves gold bundle but didn't receive emotes
body:
Pretty much title. I received everything else instantly.

Are they only going to be activated after worlds starts or is it glitched?

replies.body:
I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support. It seems likely much of that content won't activate until the events do, but support will be able to point you in the right direction regardless.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
